languages.text: "Доверяла ли я Маражаю? Нет, конечно нет. Я думала, что он изрек слова о том, где я могу найти своих братьев, лишь для того, чтобы сломить мою душу, когда я отыщу вместо них лишь смерть. Но надежда... надежда на лучшее... перевесила мою веру в тебя, элантах". {n}Ирлиэт неловко выдыхает, избегая вашего взгляда.{/n} "Охваченная надеждой, я и не думала, что единственная нить, ускользающая из моих пальцев, в итоге приведет нас в самое сердце Темного города. Я сожалею, {name}. И я хотела, чтобы ты знал{mf||а} это".

"Did I trust Marazhai? No, of course not. I thought he spoke of my kin's location to crush my soul — that he wanted me to go there and find only death instead of them. But hope... hope for the better... prevailed over my faith in you, elantach." {n}Yrliet sighs awkwardly, avoiding your gaze.{/n} "Filled with hope, the thought never even crossed my mind that this single thread, forever slipping from my grasp, would lead us to the very heart of the Dark City. I am sorry, {name}. And I wanted you to know that."
languages.original_text: "Доверяла ли я Маражаю? Нет, конечно нет. Я думала, что он изрек слова о том, где я могу найти своих братьев, лишь для того, чтобы сломить мою душу, когда я отыщу вместо них лишь смерть. Но надежда... надежда на лучшее... перевесила мою веру в тебя, элантах". {n}Ирлиэт неловко выдыхает, избегая вашего взгляда.{/n} "Охваченная надеждой, я и не думала, что единственная нить, ускользающая из моих пальцев, в итоге приведет нас в самое сердце Темного города. Я сожалею, {name}. И я хотела, чтобы ты знал{mf||а} это".

traits.locale_text: Did I trust Marazhai? No, of course not. I thought that he said the words about the location of my kinsmen simply to crush my soul when, instead of discovering my brethren, I would discover only my death when I would have gone there. But hope... hope for the better... had prevailed over my trust in you, elantach." {n}Yrliet sighs awkwardly, avoiding your gaze.{/n} "Filled with hope, nary a thought had crossed my mind that this single thread slipping away from my grasp would lead us into the very heart of the dark city. I'm sorry, {name}. And I wanted you to know this."

Did I trust Marazhai? No, of course not. But hope... hope for the better... had prevailed over my trust in you, elantach." {n}Yrliet sighs awkwardly, avoiding your gaze.{/n} "Filled with hope, nary a thought had crossed my mind that this single thread slipping away from my grasp would lead us into the very heart of the dark city. I'm sorry, {name}. And I wanted you to know this."

I am sorry, {name}. And I wanted you to know that."

I am sorry, {name}. And I wanted you to know that."

But hope... hope for the better... prevailed over my faith in you, elantach." {n}Yrliet sighs awkwardly, avoiding your gaze.{/n} "Filled with hope, the thought never even crossed my mind that this single thread, forever slipping from my grasp, would lead us to the very heart of the Dark City. I am sorry, {name}. And I wanted you to know that."

languages.text: “我信任玛拉斋吗？不，我当然不信任他。我猜想，他应该是故意告诉我族人的位置，以我的痛苦为乐。他想让我到了那个地方，却只能找到族人们的尸体。可他给了我一线希望……就是这种希望……盖过了我对你的信任，外界人。”{n}伊莉耶特不安地吐了一口气，避开你的视线。{/n}“我怀着这样的希望，却一刻都未曾怀疑过，这唯一的线索竟会把我们带到黑暗之城的中心。我很抱歉，{name}。我想告诉你的就是这些。”
languages.original_text: "Did I trust Marazhai? No, of course not. I thought he spoke of my kin's location to crush my soul — that he wanted me to go there and find only death instead of them. But hope... hope for the better... prevailed over my faith in you, elantach." {n}Yrliet sighs awkwardly, avoiding your gaze.{/n} "Filled with hope, the thought never even crossed my mind that this single thread, forever slipping from my grasp, would lead us to the very heart of the Dark City. I am sorry, {name}. And I wanted you to know that."

traits.locale_text: “我信任玛拉斋吗？不，我当然不信任他。我猜想，他应该是故意告诉我族人的位置，以我的痛苦为乐。他想让我到了那个地方，却只能找到族人们的尸体。可他给了我一线希望……就是这种希望……盖过了我对你的信任，外界人。”{n}伊莉耶特不安地吐了一口气，避开你的视线。{/n}“我怀着这样的希望，却一刻都未曾怀疑过，这唯一的线索竟会把我们带到黑暗之城的中心。我很抱歉，{name}。我想告诉你的就是这些。”

languages.text: «¿Confié en Marazhai? No, claro que no. Creí que mencionaba el paradero de mi gente para afligirme, que su intención era llevarme allí para encontrar la muerte y no a ellos. Pero la esperanza... la ilusión de que fuese cierto... prevaleció sobre mi confianza en ti, elantach». {n}Yrliet suspira avergonzada, evitando tu mirada.{/n} «Henchida de esperanza como estaba, ni siquiera se me pasó por la cabeza que esta hebra solitaria que se me escurría constantemente entre los dedos pudiese llevarnos al mismísimo corazón de la Ciudad Siniestra. Lo siento mucho, {name}. Y quiero que lo sepas».
languages.original_text: "Did I trust Marazhai? No, of course not. I thought he spoke of my kin's location to crush my soul — that he wanted me to go there and find only death instead of them. But hope... hope for the better... prevailed over my faith in you, elantach." {n}Yrliet sighs awkwardly, avoiding your gaze.{/n} "Filled with hope, the thought never even crossed my mind that this single thread, forever slipping from my grasp, would lead us to the very heart of the Dark City. I am sorry, {name}. And I wanted you to know that."

traits.locale_text: «¿Confié en Marazhai? No, claro que no. Creí que mencionaba el paradero de mi gente para afligirme, que su intención era llevarme allí para encontrar la muerte y no a ellos. Pero la esperanza... la ilusión de que fuese cierto... prevaleció sobre mi confianza en ti, elantach». {n}Yrliet suspira avergonzada, evitando tu mirada.{/n} «Henchida de esperanza como estaba, ni siquiera se me pasó por la cabeza que esta hebra solitaria que se me escurría constantemente entre los dedos pudiese llevarnos al mismísimo corazón de la Ciudad Siniestra. Lo siento mucho, {name}. Y quiero que lo sepas».

languages.text: « Est-ce que je faisais confiance à Marazhai ? Non, bien évidemment. J'étais persuadée qu'il m'avait révélé ces coordonnées dans le seul but de me briser le cœur. Il voulait que je me rende sur place et que je n'y découvre que la dévastation. Malgré tout, j'espérais... et mon espoir a éclipsé ma foi en vous, elantach. » {n}Yrliet pousse un soupir gêné en fuyant votre regard.{/n} « Pleine d'espoir, je n'ai pas envisagé une seule seconde que ce fil s'échappant de ma main nous mènerait tout droit au cœur de la Cité Crépusculaire. Je suis désolée, {name}. Je tenais à vous le dire. »
languages.original_text: "Did I trust Marazhai? No, of course not. I thought he spoke of my kin's location to crush my soul — that he wanted me to go there and find only death instead of them. But hope... hope for the better... prevailed over my faith in you, elantach." {n}Yrliet sighs awkwardly, avoiding your gaze.{/n} "Filled with hope, the thought never even crossed my mind that this single thread, forever slipping from my grasp, would lead us to the very heart of the Dark City. I am sorry, {name}. And I wanted you to know that."

traits.locale_text: « Est-ce que je faisais confiance à Marazhai ? Non, bien évidemment. J'étais persuadée qu'il m'avait révélé ces coordonnées dans le seul but de me briser le cœur. Il voulait que je rende sur place et que je n'y découvre que la dévastation. Malgré tout, j'espérais... et mon espoir a éclipsé ma foi en vous, elantach. » {n}Yrliet pousse un soupir gêné en fuyant votre regard.{/n} « Pleine d'espoir, je n'ai pas envisagé une seule seconde que ce fil s'échappant de ma main nous mènerait tout droit au cœur de la Cité Crépusculaire. Je suis désolée, {name}. Je tenais à vous le dire. »

languages.text: "Habe ich Marazhai vertraut? Nein, natürlich nicht. Ich dachte, er spräche vom Aufenthaltsort meiner Leute, um meine Seele zu zerstören – dass ich hingehen sollte und statt ihnen nur Tod vorfinden sollte. Aber die Hoffnung ... dass es nicht so wäre ... war stärker als mein Vertrauen in Euch, Elantach." {n}Yrliet seufzt verlegen und weicht deinem Blick aus.{/n} "Voller Hoffnung dachte ich gar nicht daran, dass dieser dünne Faden für immer meinem Griff entgleiten und uns ins Herz der Dunklen Stadt führen würde. Es tut mir leid, {name}. Ich wollte, dass Ihr das wisst."
languages.original_text: "Did I trust Marazhai? No, of course not. I thought he spoke of my kin's location to crush my soul — that he wanted me to go there and find only death instead of them. But hope... hope for the better... prevailed over my faith in you, elantach." {n}Yrliet sighs awkwardly, avoiding your gaze.{/n} "Filled with hope, the thought never even crossed my mind that this single thread, forever slipping from my grasp, would lead us to the very heart of the Dark City. I am sorry, {name}. And I wanted you to know that."

traits.locale_text: "Habe ich Marazhai vertraut? Nein, natürlich nicht. Ich dachte, er spräche vom Aufenthaltsort meiner Leute, um meine Seele zu zerstören – dass ich hingehen sollte und statt ihnen nur Tod vorfinden sollte. Aber die Hoffnung ... dass es nicht so wäre ... war stärker als mein Vertrauen in Euch, Elantach." {n}Yrliet seufzt verlegen und weicht deinem Blick aus.{/n} "Voller Hoffnung dachte ich gar nicht daran, dass dieser dünne Faden für immer meinem Griff entgleiten und uns ins Herz der Dunklen Stadt führen würde. Es tut mir leid, {name}. Ich wollte, dass Ihr das wisst."

languages.text: 「マラズハイを信用したのかだと？いや、もちろんしていない。奴は我の魂を打ち砕くために同族の居場所を語ったのだろうと思った…我がそこへ行き、彼らではなく死を見つけることを望んでいたのだ。だが、希望が、良い方に向かえるかもしれないという希望が…お前への信頼よりも勝っていたのだ、エランタ」{n}ユリエットは気まずそうにため息をつき、あなたの視線を避ける。{/n}「希望に満ち溢れ、この一本の糸が…永遠に我の手から滑り落ち、我らを仄暗き都の中心へと導くとは思いもよらなかった。すまない、{name}。それに、お前にはそのことを知ってほしかったんだ」
languages.original_text: "Did I trust Marazhai? No, of course not. I thought he spoke of my kin's location to crush my soul — that he wanted me to go there and find only death instead of them. But hope... hope for the better... prevailed over my faith in you, elantach." {n}Yrliet sighs awkwardly, avoiding your gaze.{/n} "Filled with hope, the thought never even crossed my mind that this single thread, forever slipping from my grasp, would lead us to the very heart of the Dark City. I am sorry, {name}. And I wanted you to know that."

traits.locale_text: 「マラズハイを信用したのかだと？いや、もちろんしていない。奴は我の魂を打ち砕くために同族の居場所を語ったのだろうと思った…我がそこへ行き、彼らではなく死を見つけることを望んでいたのだ。だが、希望が、良い方に向かえるかもしれないという希望が…お前への信頼よりも勝っていたのだ、エランタ」{n}ユリエットは気まずそうにため息をつき、あなたの視線を避ける。{/n}「希望に満ち溢れ、この一本の糸が…永遠に我の手から滑り落ち、我らを仄暗き都の中心へと導くとは思いもよらなかった。すまない、{name}。それに、お前にはそのことを知ってほしかったんだ」

languages.text: "Marazhai'a güvendim mi? Tabii ki hayır. Soydaşlarımın konumunu ruhumu ezmek için söylediğini düşündüm, oraya gidip soydaşlarım yerine ölümü bulmamı istedi. Fakat umut... Daha iyisinin olacağına dair umudum, sana olan inancımdan ağır bastı elantach." {n}Yrliet, gözlerini kaçırarak iç çekiyor.{/n} "Umut doluydum. Asla yakalayamadığım ipin ucunun, bizi Kara Şehir'in ortasına sürükleyebileceği aklımdan geçmedi. Üzgünüm {name}. Bunu bilmeni istedim."
languages.original_text: "Did I trust Marazhai? No, of course not. I thought he spoke of my kin's location to crush my soul — that he wanted me to go there and find only death instead of them. But hope... hope for the better... prevailed over my faith in you, elantach." {n}Yrliet sighs awkwardly, avoiding your gaze.{/n} "Filled with hope, the thought never even crossed my mind that this single thread, forever slipping from my grasp, would lead us to the very heart of the Dark City. I am sorry, {name}. And I wanted you to know that."

Daha iyisinin olacağına dair umudum, sana olan inancımdan ağır bastı elantach." {n}Yrliet, gözlerini kaçırarak iç çekiyor.{/n} "Umut doluydum. Asla yakalayamadığım ipin ucunun, bizi Kara Şehir'in ortasına sürükleyebileceği aklımdan geçmedi. Üzgünüm {name}. Bunu bilmeni istedim."
